data.name: Encode the Message
data.description:
Given a string you have to encode it using this table as reference: ```javascript 0 1 2 3 4 5 +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 0 | A | B | C | D | E | F | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 1 | G | H | I | J | K | L | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 2 | M | N | O | P | Q | R | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 3 | S | T | U | V | W | X | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 4 | Y | Z | | 1 | 2 | 3 | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ 5 | 4 | 5 | 6 | 7 | 8 | 9 | +---+---+---+---+---+---+ ``` ```javascript "abcd" => "00010203" ```
  • a ```0 0```= row 0 and column 0
  • b ```0 1```= row 0 and column 1
  • c ```0 2```= row 0 and column 2
  • d ```0 3```= row 0 and column 3

```javascript "HeLlO WoRlD" => "1104151522423422251503" ```
  • whitespace ```4 2```= row 4 and column 2
If the given string contains charters that are not in the table return ```javascript "not convertible" ``` The given string can be uppercase, lowercase or both.
